description1: I am a passionate Software Engineer specialized in Full-stack development and DevOps. My experience spans both front-end and back-end, enabling me to deliver integrated, high-performance applications. With a strong foundation in modern frameworks and languages, I excel at creating intuitive and adaptive user interfaces that work seamlessly across all devices, along with robust, scalable back-end solutions that support them.
description2: In the field of DevOps, I have experience in automating deployments, managing infrastructure, and ensuring systems are reliable and secure. With knowledge in CI/CD, containerizing apps, and utilizing cloud services to streamline development and create consistent, efficient workflows. My goal is always to optimize the development lifecycle, ensuring fast, reliable delivery and a top-quality user experience.
skill3: Backend Development: Node.js, Express, REST APIs, GraphQL
skill5: Cloud Services and Infrastructure: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
skill6: CI/CD Infrastructure and DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins
skill9: Certifications: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate, AWS Certified Developer - Associate
description4: In every project, I am motivated by problem-solving, collaboration, and continuous learning to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies. I am excited to bring both creativity and precision to the work I do, helping companies transform their ideas into reality.
vibing-description: Vibing is a modern dating platform designed for real connections. It features user profiles, swipe-based matching, and secure authentication for a reliable dating experience. Vibing enables real-time communication via WebSocket-powered chats, allowing users to engage in instant, fluid conversations. With a sleek, user-friendly interface and robust privacy features.
streamtube-description: StreamTube is a streaming application project inspired by platforms like Netflix. It allows users to browse, stream, and watch a wide range of movies via torrent links, providing smooth video playback directly within the app. Built with a full-stack development approach, StreamTube includes user authentication, profile management, search functionality, and multilingual support. The project combines front-end and back-end skills, requiring third-party API integration, secure user sessions, and responsive design to deliver an intuitive and feature-rich streaming experience.
contact-info: I am always open to connecting and discussing new projects, innovative ideas, and potential collaborations. If you are looking for a dedicated partner to help bring your vision to life with creativity and technical expertise, I would love to explore how we can work together.
